steps.description: We discuss your challenges and goals. If I think I can help, and you like what you hear... we move on.
The team and I workshop a current challenge together. You get to know me, I get learn about them, plus we deliver something of real value.
You and the team decide if you'd like to work with me further. If so, we continue. If not, we amicably part ways.

steps.step: I put together a tailored programme.
steps.description: If we decide to continue, I'll put together a tailored programme for ~1-3 months, focused on the most pressing team and business challenges.

steps.step: The team(s) and I get cracking.
steps.description: I work with the team. We regularly review progress against outcomes, with rolling monthly contracts available for peace of mind.
